name: CheckPoint (Sutivu)
description:
Checkpoint is a game you can choose where are the chackpoints. 
Easy to play, hard to master type of game.

Moving Left or Right:
- Left/Right key on the keyboard
- RB/LB On the gamepad
- Right Click/Left Click On the mouse

Add check point:
Space on the keyboard
Midel Mouse button for the mouse
A/Start on a gamepad

Jump:
When you moving in a direction press the other direction at the same time to jump.
